name: issuer
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && node server.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
